name: There are no checkpoints
description:
Janky controls, questionable physics and absolutely no checkpoints. What else could you want?

A platforming-mad challenge game. High-speed, or slow. You decide the risk. One wrong move, and it's back to the start.


Made in PICO-8, with my own art.

Controls

Arrow keys - Movement

X - Jump / Menu select

Z - Dash / Hold for main menu

A possible contender to World's hardest game. This game is very hard. In fact, I have only completed it in sections, not fully all the way through.

I wish you luck.
